About

Note Manager is a wide-encompassing web & desktop application that was designed in just two days.
The challenge has been assigned by Focus21 Inc. as part of their future employee assessment process.
The project files, documentation, & testing can be found at maxmastalerz/Focus21-Inc.-CRUD-application.

The stack & technologies I worked with to complete the project were:

  • ES6 with BabelJS
  • Webpack for packaging client-side code
  • ExpressJS
  • NodeJS
  • MustacheJS
  • NPM
  • React
  • Redux
  • MySQL
  • REST API
  • CSS with SASS precompiler
  • Heroku
  • PHPMyAdmin
  • & more!

You can visit the application by clicking on the navigation link located on the top banner.
